name: UpgradeUSA
tag_list: consumer, laptop, tablet, ecommerce, reseller, personal-finance
overview:
40% of the US Consumer market has credit that is considered “bad.” UpgradeUSA offers an online solution for those customers who are looking to build credit or establish credit, while helping them afford the latest mobile technology they may need for home, work, or school.

The company is providng an online alternative to the $7.8B rent-to-own industry, which is almost exclusively operated out of retail locations. To customers, UpgradeUSA offers a superior solution to rent-to-own because the company offers better quality products, lower payments, an online shopping experience, and credit-buidling.

Once approved to the program after filling out a short online application, consumers are eligible to participate in program to obtain their choice of new or refurbished laptop computers. The company reports each monthly payment to all three major U.S. credit bureaus.

Customers can choose to purchase the computer at any time during the lease process, or can end their lease at any time after a few months (varies by state) and return the computer, with no penalty. Leases typically end at 17 months, at which point the customer will own the computer.

Our innovative program is available in a growing number of states across the U.S.

video_embeds.description: Overview of the UpgradeUSA Program and Philosophy
